pageProps.title: parseCliOptions
pageProps.md:
Function: parseCliOptions

▸ parseCliOptions(config: ParseCliOptionsConfig): WebpackOptions

Parse CLI arguments received from React Native CLI when running start or bundle commands. The CLI options will be only available when running with React Native CLI. When running with Webpack CLI, values from fallback field from ParseCliOptionsConfig will be used.

fallback.mode and fallback.dev values should always go together as a tuple: ('development', true) or ('production', false). Specifying different values might result in undefined behavior. You can however omit one and the other will be inferred.

Parameters:

NameTypeDescription
configParseCliOptionsConfigConfiguration options.

Returns:

WebpackOptions — Webpack options to create a valid Webpack configuration with.

Defined in: src/webpack/utils/parseCliOptions.ts:64
